name: Osa

biography.description: Osa uses the Talon-8 Clear Shield to provide a transparent and bulletproof line of sight, aiding in attack strategies and team support.

gameplayTips: Deploy the Talon-8 Clear Shield to create safe sightlines for your team.
Use the shield to block enemy fire while advancing or holding a position.
Coordinate with teammates to maximize the strategic advantage of the shield.
